resources.string:
Effective cost per thousand impressions 
An estimate of the revenue you receive per 1000 impressions. 

 Note: eCpm can vary based on available ads costs and users' countries.
The total number of ads shown to users \nImpressions are affected by match rate and number of requests made by app users.
Percentage of total ads loaded per total requests \nThe higher the eCPM floor the lower the match rate.
The minimum eCPM that needed to load ads \neCPm Floor affects match rate, impressions and your earnings. \nSetting a high eCPM floor may decrease your ads performance.
Time period that needed to request and show a new ad \nIt Determines how often a new ad request is generated for this ad unit and a new ad is shown to the user.
Your earnings accrued so far \nThis amount is an estimate that is subject to change when your earnings are verified for accuracy at the end of every month.
